name: new-deck
description: Scaffold a new Quarto deck from a template
prompt: Create a new Quarto deck named {{slug}} using the {{template}} template (revealjs|pptx|beamer|executive-summary). Update YAML with title '{{title}}', author '{{author}}', date today. Place it under examples/deck-{{slug}}/index.qmd. Then print next steps to render and publish.

name: edit-deck
description: Edit or extend the current Quarto presentation
prompt: You are editing an existing Quarto presentation (.qmd). Follow AI_AGENT_GUIDE.md. Improve structure, fix YAML, add slides/notes, apply house style. If user mentions Executive Summary, ensure Overview/Updates/Risks slides exist.

name: publish-deck
description: Publish the current deck (HTML Pages, PPTX, or PDF)
prompt: Inspect the current .qmd YAML. If format.revealjs → GitHub Pages; if format.pptx → produce PPTX; if beamer/pdf → produce PDF. For Pages ensure project.output-dir: docs or gh-pages workflow exists. Run appropriate render steps and summarize where to find outputs/URL.
